snippet: Before playing the game of his life, DeMarcus Ware gave a speech that inspired his Broncos teammates on the eve of their beat-down of Tom Brady and the New England Patriots....
lead_paragraph: Before playing the game of his life, DeMarcus Ware gave a speech that inspired his Broncos teammates on the eve of their beat-down of Tom Brady and the New England Patriots.

headline.main: DeMarcus Ware Gave an Epic Speech on Eve of AFC Championship
headline.print_headline: DeMarcus Ware Gave an Epic Speech on Eve of AFC Championship
